oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Letter from Mary Hardeman to W. D. Shute
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter to W. D. Shute from his Aunt Mary Hardeman. She chides him for not writing more often, discusses family and personal news and gives advice on the renovation at Grassmere.
Mary Moore Murfree Hilliard Hardeman (1805-1890) was the aunt of Lavinia Hilliard (1837-1873), who married William Dickson Shute in 1856. Mary was the granddaughter of Col. Hardy Murfree.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hardeman, Mary, 1805-1890
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Correspondence; Dwellings--Remodeling;
